text: Piruauna tuberosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Piruauna. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 1998.Biolib.cz - Piruauna tuberosa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1998 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Piruauna
